If they can finally get rid of cheaters it will be a decent game. And last update doesn't make sense at all. Every time my team is playing with 4 people. All the penalty the leaving player gets is 30 minutes of competitive match cooldown. It is not fair at all. And to compensate the lack of men we get extra money every round but only after 2 rounds. Why are we waiting for 2 rounds if we are already playing with only 4 people? even when we are playing with 3 people it is the same. At least they can set it so it doesn't affect our ranking when we are not playing with full team. Extra money doesn't compensate our shortage and even then we don't get money for 2 rounds. We lose almost all the time when we are not full team. And there is a lot of griefing in the game. They kill their teammates. They purposefully try to get damaged by our grenades or our shooting to get us kicked.  They should find solutions for these. Sometimes we see that all of our team reported the other team for cheating or other reasons and we still match with them. This doesn't make sense.
PS: The last update on the map Dust 2 ruined the map. They shouldn't have made a major change in the most successful map in the game.
